name: A QUIET PLACE ECGJ
description:
My Entry to the Game Jam of Extra Credits.

A Rutinary Mision become his last one, when
he got infected with a virus that spread very
quick. His wants to reach the leak and die in
peaceful. But his needs to do it quick, because
the infection it's spread and if he don't reach
that area can infect all the population in the
farm. Can you reach the leak before your time
goes zero.
